sentences.en: China's Capital Markets: Where From Here and When Will Markets Reopen?
sentences.cn: 中国资本市场: 市场窗口何日再开放及何去何从?

sentences.en: He feared that mentioning it might reopen the wound.
sentences.cn: 他害怕提到这些会触及别人的伤心事.

sentences.en: His results are likely to reopen the debate on race and education.
sentences.cn: 他的结果可能会重新引起关于种族和教育的辩论。

sentences.en: I'd buy the Quick Stop and reopen it myself!
sentences.cn: 我会把小歇便利店买回来重新开张!
我们可别再提旧时的伤心事了.

sentences.en: Look, let's try not to reopen any old wounds this time, OK?
sentences.cn: 嘿, 咱们这次别提任何伤心事, 好 吗 ?

sentences.en: Middle East peace talks reopen in Washington on Wednesday.
sentences.cn: 中东和平谈判于周三在华盛顿重启。

sentences.en: Most shops will reopen today and people will set firecrackers to celebrate.
sentences.cn: 大部份商店会在今天开始重新开业,并且燃放鞭炮庆祝.

sentences.en: The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention has advised that schools reopen.
sentences.cn: 疾病控制和预防中心建议学校重新开放.

sentences.en: The cinema will reopen next week after the renovation.
sentences.cn: 电影院修缮后,将于下星期开业.

sentences.en: The company originally intended to reopen the factory with non-union workers.
sentences.cn: 公司原打算雇用不属于工会的工人重新开工。

sentences.en: The disclosures will reopen the highly charged debate about euthanasia.
sentences.cn: 这些数字的披露再次引起了对安乐死的激烈争论.

sentences.en: The hotel will reopen next week after its ￡1 million renovation.
sentences.cn: 该饭店在花费一百万英镑将其整修后将于下星期重新开放.

sentences.en: The letter contained a clear commitment to reopen talks.
sentences.cn: 这封信明确承诺要重新开始谈判.

sentences.en: The swimming pool will reopen in May.
sentences.cn: 游泳池将于5月份重新开放。

sentences.en: The Theatre Royal, Norwich, will reopen in November.
sentences.cn: 诺里奇的皇家戏院将在11月重新开业。

trans.tran_en: if a theatre, restaurant etc reopens, or if it is reopened, it opens again after a period when it was closed

trans.tran_cn: 再开，重新打开，重新开始
